content: The net loss for the six months ended June 30, 2022, was $23.5 million compared to the six months ended June 30, 2021, net loss of $20 million, a $3.5 million increase in net loss was primarily due to $9.4 million increase in goodwill and intangible asset impairment, noncash; a $2 million increase in development expenditures; a $1.5 million increase in sales and marketing spend; a $1.4 million decrease in equity method investment income; a $900,000 increase in foreign currency losses; $600,000 lower gross profit; and $200,000 in higher interest expense.
